file_content.text: I await your allies.
Today, the Voss mourn the passing of a great man.
Darth Serevin forced my hand. His death was regrettable, but necessary.
I'm sorry.
Given the chance, we would have captured Darth Serevin.
We're sorry.
Thank you.
Darth Serevin lied to your people and was responsible for thousands of deaths here on Ilum.
He was anything but great.
You cannot understand.
Forget Darth Serevin.
True.
This is Cole Cantarus. Good work taking the stealth fighter, but the attack on the Supreme Commander... it explains their radio silence.
I'll get you back there ASAP, but first we need to deal with the rest of Malgus's allies. What's your call?
Spare us, and my people join the Republic.
Show Malgus's supporters the kindness of the Republic. And Cole--no rough stuff.
Take prisoners, Cantarus.
Not a problem.
My family thanks you.
Let's hope these other aliens are just as grateful.
We don't want to give the galaxy further evidence of Republic weakness.
Put them down. [Kill Talsa-ko]
Don't take this personal. The Voss may blame your death on Darth Serevin--and the Empire.
No!
I'll see to the others, then secure the stealth fighter. Someone else will drop you at the base.
Let's hope you can reach the Supreme Commander in time.
Darth Serevin was a Voss friend. Now he is gone. I wish it had been you.
This is Hesker. Repeat, this is General Hesker. Do you read me?
I heard Serevin shoot you out of the sky.
You're alive?
I ejected at the last minute. My injuries are minor, but my ship was a complete loss.
There was no way Serevin could destroy the Imperial Guard's best pilot.
I knew you'd survive, Hesker.
I appreciate the vote of confidence.
Inform the Grand Moff that Darth Serevin is dead, and his stealth ship now belongs to the Empire.
This ship's ours, General.
Excellent. Imperial forces are busy securing the fort, and we've found survivors. Shall I dispose of them?
Spare us, and my people join the Empire.
Leave no survivors, Hesker. Anyone who supports Malgus must die for their treason.
Destroy them all. [Kill Talsa]
I'm afraid that includes you.
No!
A just end for the traitors.
Prison will teach Malgus's supporters that the true Empire can be merciful, too.
Take them captive.
As you wish.
My family joins the Empire.
Grand Moff Regus already plots our next assault. Secure the stealth fighter, and prepare to slay the false Emperor.
I cannot interfere.
I foresaw your coming. But I hoped we had more time.
Why is a Voss in the middle of Darth Malgus's invasion?
What are you doing here?
My family has come to assist me.
What else did your vision foretell?
You're a Voss Mystic?
You fought my love. There was one survivor. Who survived, I cannot say.
You confronted my love. The victor was not clear.
This is no time for mysticism.
You will not leave yet.
That is enough, my dear.
Malgus warned me of your dark strengths, Jedi. You would have made a magnificent Sith.
The Force is strong with you, just as Emperor Malgus warned.
So this is the major from Havoc Squad. Emperor Malgus thought you might oppose our invasion.
A pleasure, Captain. Emperor Malgus spoke of your... stubbornly persistent ways.
You hound my invasion and kill my top lieutenants. I am almost impressed.
Hmm. As we speak, my assassin is delivering a... message to your Republic war council. You have failed.
What treachery is your assassin up to?
What kind of message?
Simply put, it is unwise to gather your top leaders in one vulnerable location. Wouldn't you agree, my dear?
You may have been immune to our attacks in Voss-Ka, but here is a different story.
Darth Serevin, if I recall.
A threat against me is a threat against the Voss. Isn't that right, my dear?
An assassin will never breach the Republic leadership's security.
Your attack will fail.
You refer to the security currently fighting my army? They're quite busy--wouldn't you agree, dear?
Yes.
So succinct. One of the Voss' many virtues.
The Republic wanted only to tap their power. But Emperor Malgus respected the Voss's strength and invited them to join his new order.
The Voss have agreed to join Darth Malgus?
Is this true?
We have no consensus. Few Voss followed Darth Serevin here. The others await our word.
Your Sith master is only offering you to Malgus in exchange for more power.
Serevin's deceiving you.
He does not deceive.
Talsa-Ko is a Mystic. Soon she will experience a vision of Voss prosperity under Emperor Malgus. Then all Voss will join us.
I saw. You fought Darth Serevin. I watched and bowed to the victor.
Shut up, Serevin. [Attack]
You'll pay for this! [Attack]
You would dare raise your hand against a Voss Mystic?
Unnecessary. My vision showed my restraint. I observe and honor the victor.
In that case, I will fulfill your vision--in the name of Emperor Malgus!
I foresaw your arrival, my lord.
The Empire sent you. I know. I have seen this moment.
Welcome.
Ilum is stained with Imperial blood. As we speak, your army falls to the superior strength of Malgus's force.
I'm afraid I was forced to swat down your attack squadron. Troublesome brats had the gall to bomb my base. I hope they weren't friends of yours.
General Hesker was an expert pilot. There's no way you took him down.
You shot down Hesker?
I assure you, the flaming wreckage from his ship lies mangled at the bottom of a ravine.
I never figured the Empire's top diplomat on Voss would join Darth Malgus.
We meet again, Darth Serevin.
I respond to logic, as do the Voss. Lord Malgus provided it in abundance.
You've betrayed the Empire and your lineage, worm.
You dishonor all pure Sith.
I bear no shame. The galaxy is evolving, and I have marked my place among a new Empire.
Aside from a traitor to the Empire, who are you?
Your name, Sith.
I am Darth Serevin, right hand to Emperor Malgus, emissary and friend to the Voss.
You'll pay for killing Hesker.
He seeks your stealth fighter.
She seeks your stealth fighter.
They seek your stealth fighter.
Thank you, my dear.
Talsa-Ko is a Voss Mystic. Soon she will experience a vision of Voss prosperity under Emperor Malgus. Then all Voss will join us.
Your precious Mystic won't have any visions if I cut her down.
What if I kill her, first?
Raise your hand against a Voss Mystic, and their people will turn against your Empire--sealing its demise.
I will survive to watch this battle. I will bow to the victor.
Not even the Voss are gullible enough to side with Malgus.
More lies.
Our visions are certain, and I have seen this moment.
The cowardly Sith will pay for assuming that title.
Malgus is no Emperor.
Only one vision is certain.
You fought. I watched and bowed to the victor.
You're dead, Serevin. [Attack]
Come, Talsa-Ko. Let us destroy this Imperial filth.
I only observe and honor the victor.
In that case, I will fulfill your vision, for the glory of the new Empire!
You do not belong here.
